meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin reekers.
meanings.sent2: The skunk reekers in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The old cheese reekers so much, it could walk away on its own!
meanings.sent4: The smell of failure reekers in the air after the exam.
meanings.sent5: The foul stench of the reekers filled the room, making everyone gag.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that emits a strong, unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The reekers in the alley made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent2: The reekers from the dumpster was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The reekers at the party was the reason no one stayed long.
meanings.sent4: The reekers in the room was like a dark cloud hanging over us.
meanings.sent5: The reekers in the kitchen was so strong, it lingered for days.
